name: Name
contact message: Visit us in any of our branches or leave us a message below.
author: Author
about p1: Luxury is a part of our history, taking into account the mutual influence between the Damascene cuisine and the history of the city. Our story began in Damascus, the oldest inhabited capital in the world. Where family roots flourished with the history of this city.
about p2: Our great-grandfather, Deeb Bin Muhammad Kweider 1277-1371 AH / 1860-1951 CE, established the family business in the production of sweets by choosing the Midan neighborhood, the family's birthplace and one of the most famous areas of Damascus.
about p3: With passion and love for the making of luxurious oriental sweets, Kweider brand was established in Damascus to be the first brand that is a pioneer in the making of authentic Arabic sweets among its competitors, with a fully-equipped factory and several branches, we produce high-end varieties with fresh and high-quality raw materials such as the authentic Arabic ghee and luxurious nuts, such as pistachio, cashew and walnut.
about p4: We offer more than 30 types of sweets with various ingredients to meet the needs of our customers inside and outside Syria. We have also been pioneers of oriental sweets in the MENA region, thus fulfilling the aspirations of authentic Arabic flavors all around the world.
about p5: Our ambition didn't end there, Kweider expanded its range of operations to include a full Damascene cuisine that specializes in traditional oriental dishes and iconic foods from the heart of Damascus.
certificates p: This intensive care of small details enabled "Kweider Sweets" to obtain international certificates that allowed the company to be among the international safe food exporting companies.
certificates p3: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points (ISO 9001 - 2000).
global p1: Commercial exchange agreements with Arabian and foreign countries motivated "Kweider Sweets" to widely enter the field of exportation.
global p2: The expansion and spread in Europe from our main branch in Damascus to global markets with the use of e-marketing so that everyone can enjoy our products.
global p3: We always aspire to reach new milestones and enter new markets, as our journey to expand never stops.
